translations: n.血清型；[免疫]血清学分型
v.按血清型分类；决定……的血清型（serotype 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 血清学分型, 血清型, 血清分型

sentences.sentence: There was close antigen relationship between Vibrio fluvialis and Vibrio furnissii, serotyping of V. fluvialis could be made with the diagnostic-serum of V. furnissii.
sentences.translation: 部分河弧菌与弗尼斯弧菌存在着密切的抗原关系，故也可用弗尼斯弧菌的诊断血清对河弧菌作出定型。
